name: Cisco | IOS | Network | UDLD | UDLD Protocol Error Detected (SYSLOG)
description: %PM-SP-4-ERR_DISABLE: udld error detected on Gi4/1, putting Gi4/1 in err-disable state
event_class__name: Network | UDLD | UDLD Protocol Error Detected

patterns.value_re: %PM(-SP)?-4-ERR_DISABLE: udld error detected on (?P<interface>\S+), putting \S+ in err-disable state

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | UDLD | UDLD Protocol Recovery (SYSLOG)
description: %PM-4-ERR_RECOVER: Attempting to recover from udld err-disable state on Gi0/24

patterns.value_re: %PM(-SP)?-4-ERR_RECOVER: Attempting to recover from udld err-disable state on (?P<interface>\S+)
